decomposition.reasoning_trace:
Step 1: Field Inventory
- Found 2 fields in form_data
- 0 text fields, 1 numeric field (patient_age), 1 enum field (patient_gender), 0 boolean fields, 0 aggregation fields

Step 2: Cognitive Behavior Analysis
- Numeric extractions: [patient_age] - Direct extraction of age value from demographics
- Enum classifications: [patient_gender] - Classification into predefined gender categories
- No aggregation or synthesis fields present

Step 3: Grouping Decision
- Created 2 signatures by grouping fields with same cognitive behavior
- ExtractNumericFields for patient_age (direct numeric extraction)
- ClassifyEnumFields for patient_gender (classification into options)
- Both are independent extractions from document, no dependencies

Step 4: Verification
- All 2 fields covered
- No duplicates
- No dependencies (all fields are independent extractions)
